parameter.name: ConnectionString
parameter.hint: Make sure connection parameters are correct

input.arg: "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><lastconnection><converter hash="-2128830753" id="" /><protocol type="RED"><Group name="Network"><Var name="RedAddress" displayname="Network Address" type="string" value="localhost" uivalue="localhost" isHex="False" /><Var name="RedPort" displayname="Port" type="uint" value="10001" uivalue="10001" isHex="False" /><Var name="RedResetEnabled" displayname="Reset on Connection" type="customBool" value="False" uivalue="Disabled" isHex="False" /><Var name="InterruptMode" displayname="Attention Mode" type="intModeList" value="1" uivalue="Interrupt" isHex="False" /><Var name="PollingDelay" displayname="Polling Span" type="int" value="100" uivalue="100" isHex="False" /></Group><Group name="Advanced Settings"><Var name="RedBridgeLocation" displayname="ADB Location" type="string" value="Auto" uivalue="Auto" isHex="False" /><Var name="RedStartBat" displayname="RED Remote Bat" type="string" value="" uivalue="" isHex="False" /><Var name="RedAPK" displayname="RED Remote Apk" type="string" value="" uivalue="" isHex="False" /><Var name="InstallRed" displayname="InstallRed" type="button" value="" uivalue="" isHex="False" /><Var name="UninstallRed" displayname="UninstallRed" type="button" value="" uivalue="" isHex="False" /></Group><Group name="Discovery"><Var name="DiscoveryPackrat" displayname="Packrat" type="ulong" value="Discover" uivalue="Discover" isHex="False" /></Group></protocol></lastconnection>"

parameter.name: Limits

metadata.name: Firmware ID Test
metadata.description: Firmware ID Test verifies firmware number

parameter.name: Firmware ID
parameter.description: Firmware ID to compare against one found on device.

metadata.name: Device Package Test
metadata.description: Device Package Test verifies part number

parameter.name: Device Package
parameter.description: Device package to compare against the one found on device.

metadata.name: Sync Short Test
